body_html:
I think there are some object files missing from the tensorflow_static target in tf_shared_lib.cmake. Can you try adding the following line here and here?

    $<TARGET_OBJECTS:tf_cc_while_loop>

The symbols cudnnConvolutionBiasActivationForward and cudnnSetRNNDescriptor_v6 seem to be part of cuDNN 6. I'm not sure where you picked up the recommendation to use cuDNN 5.1, but I think that that might be incorrect. Upgrading to cuDNN 6 should fix this part of the build.
body_text:
I think there are some object files missing from the tensorflow_static target in tf_shared_lib.cmake. Can you try adding the following line here and here?
    $<TARGET_OBJECTS:tf_cc_while_loop>

The symbols cudnnConvolutionBiasActivationForward and cudnnSetRNNDescriptor_v6 seem to be part of cuDNN 6. I'm not sure where you picked up the recommendation to use cuDNN 5.1, but I think that that might be incorrect. Upgrading to cuDNN 6 should fix this part of the build.
body:
I think there are some object files missing from the `tensorflow_static` target in [`tf_shared_lib.cmake`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/635196732151e6d8638c189c52f4c4336ede81b6/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_shared_lib.cmake). Can you try adding the following line [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/635196732151e6d8638c189c52f4c4336ede81b6/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_shared_lib.cmake#L38) and [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/635196732151e6d8638c189c52f4c4336ede81b6/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_shared_lib.cmake#L75)?

```
    $<TARGET_OBJECTS:tf_cc_while_loop>
```

The symbols `cudnnConvolutionBiasActivationForward` and `cudnnSetRNNDescriptor_v6` seem to be part of cuDNN 6. I'm not sure where you picked up the recommendation to use cuDNN 5.1, but I think that that might be incorrect. Upgrading to cuDNN 6 should fix this part of the build.
